page.title: 07ATTITUDES
page.content: {SHOPPING SURVEY} Aberdare is a town built in a valley situation on the confluence of the rivers Dare and Cynon.The site is the most accessible point in the north of the Cynon Valley,being located on a bridging point of the river.The town is therefore a route centre and a focus for regional and local bus services. The shopping area is centred around three streets - Commercial Street, Canon Street and Market Street.As a shopping centre Aberdare provides a wide range of goods,from milk and bread to higher order items such as carpets and furniture.A shop door questionnaire revealed that out of 50 people surveyed,72% bought the bulk of their shopping at the centre and 62% bought most of their durable goods there also.
